channel.title: [PI} degradeable Barrows help

item.title: [PI} degradeable Barrows help
item.dc:creator: @corpze corpze
item.description:
@corpze wrote:

hi guys im trying to make degrade-able barrows, but i got some problems could someone help me a lil ? just with etc dh helm ?

i dont really know if it’s the way to do it. but im trying its kinda the first time i try to make something from the very scratch, well i folowed a tut but it only gave me int’s n such. so please someone point me in the right direction

here is my code:[code]package server.model.content;

import server.Server;
import server.Config;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.model.players.Client;

public class DegradingBarrows {

public int DHelmHP = 1000;
public int DPlateHP = 1000;
public int DLegsHP = 1000;
public int DAxeHP = 1000;
	

	

public Client c;
public DegradingBarrows(Client Client) {
	this.c = Client;
}

public enum Helms {
	DHelm(4716, 4880, 4881, 4882, 4883);
	private int id1;
	private int id2;
	private int id3;
	private int id4;
	private int id5;
	Helms(int id1, int id2, int id3, int id4, int id5) {
		this.id1 = id1;
		this.id2 = id2;
		this.id3 = id3;
		this.id4 = id4;
		this.id5 = id5;
		}
	public int getId1() {
	return id1;}
	public int getId2() {
	return id2;}
	public int getId3() {
	return id3;}
	public int getId4() {
	return id4;}
	public int getId5() {
	return id5;}
	}
	

public void CheckForItem(Client c){
if (c.playerEquipment[0] == id1 || c.playerEquipment[0] == id2 || c.playerEquipment[0] == id2|| c.playerEquipment[0] == id3 || c.playerEquipment[0] == id4){
	DHelmHp -= 1;
	c.sendMessage("Dharok's helm charge is at "+DHelmHp);
}

}


public void CheckForDegrade(Client c){
	if (c.playerEquipment[0] == id1 && DHelmHP == 999) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = 4880;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has degraded slightly.");
    }
	
	if (c.playerEquipment[0] == id2 && DHelmHP == 750) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = 4881;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has degraded slightly.");
    }
	if (c.playerEquipment[0] == id3 && DHelmHP == 500) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = 4882;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has degraded slightly.");
    }
	if (c.playerEquipment[0] == id4 && DHelmHP == 250) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = 4883;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has degraded slightly.");
    }
	if (c.playerEquipment[0] == id5 && DHelmHP == 0) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = -1;
        c.getItems().addItem(4884, 1);
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has broken, talk to bob in Yanille shop to repair it.");
    }
	// END OF DHAROKS HELM
	}

}[/code]

i didn’t want to add all of this in the client.java. so im trying to add my own class.

but i have this in client .java

and

public DegradingBarrows getDEGB() { return degradingBarrows; }

Read full topic
